alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:38AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HEAT INDEX VALUES BETWEEN 105 AND 109 DEGREES ARE EXPECTED TODAY... The combination of expected temperature and relative humidity values will result in maximum Heat Index values between 105 and 109 degrees inclusive today over the barrier islands. Affected residents with outdoor activities planned are urged to drink plenty of water, wear light weight and light colored clothing and take frequent breaks from the heat. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
